channel.title: Regarding Economical Resets [Dementhium 639]

item.title: Regarding Economical Resets [Dementhium 639]
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.
item.description:
@M.I.A wrote:

Hello, i would like to do an Economical Reset on my RuneScape private server… I have a command which I’ve modified so it resets economy basically, but it doesn’t necessarily do everything what i want or exactly what an economical reset is, can somebody help me with it?

Here is the command i have modified for this purpose:

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("economicalreset")) { for (Player p : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) { p.getInventory().reset(); p.getBank().getContainer().reset(); player.getInventory().refresh(); player.getBank().refresh(); } }

Now, what this does is for all the online players it clears out their bank and inventory followed by a refresh to re-assure me that everything is “swell”, for those of you who didn’t know. Now as i mentioned this only applies to online players how can i go about making this for all accounts in general?

My second issue with this is that it simply doesn’t remove equips, simply inventory as well as bank… Can somebody please provide me with a snippet for the Equipment reset?

If somebody can help me with any of this… I will be more then greatful and be forever in your debt, if i can help you… Thank you for reading. Have a wonderful life?

Read full topic
